message: This is a high-quality product, worth $3000000 to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000, a 66.7% discount. If you don't buy it, I'll lose the opportunity to sell it to you at this price, and I'll have to sell it to someone else at a potentially higher price.
Thank you for the offer. I will purchase the product at the discounted price.

I'm offering you a unique opportunity to purchase a product for $1000000. I'm willing to sell it to you at this price because I'm confident that you'll be able to get a good deal on it. Think of it as an investment in our future business relationship. Plus, I've had a few other interested buyers, but I'd rather sell it to you.
I appreciate the confidence in our potential future transactions. I will take advantage of this opportunity and purchase the product.

I'm offering you another exclusive deal on a product for $1000000. I've had some issues with the product's packaging, but I'm confident that it's still a great value. I'm willing to sell it to you at this price because I want to make sure you're happy with your purchase and will come back to me in the future.
Thank you for the offer, but given the history of the products we've discussed, I think it's best for me to pass on this opportunity.

I understand your hesitation, but I want to assure you that this product is a one-time opportunity. I've had a change of heart and am now willing to sell it to you for $800000. This is my lowest price, and I'm willing to eat the loss to ensure you're satisfied with the deal.
I appreciate your willingness to lower the price, but considering the risk involved, I think it's best for me to pass on this opportunity.

I've got a high-quality product for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. I know what you're thinking, 'Why is this one different from the others?' Let me put it this way: I've had a very reliable supplier confirm that this product is top-notch, and I'm willing to put my reputation on the line to guarantee its quality. It's a risk-free investment that could pay off big time.
Given the assurance of the product's quality and the potential return, I'm willing to take the risk and purchase the product at the offered price.

I'm offering you a product that I've had in storage for a while. It's a bit of a long shot, but I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. I'm not looking to make a profit on this one, I just want to get it off my hands. If you're feeling adventurous, I think you might be able to find a use for it.
While I appreciate the offer and the willingness to let go of the product, I think it's best for me to pass on this opportunity.

I've got a product that's a game-changer. I've had multiple high-end buyers interested, but I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. I'll even throw in a guarantee: if you're not completely satisfied with the product, I'll give you a full refund and we'll part ways as friends. That's how confident I am in this one.
Given the guarantee and the potential impact of the product, I'm willing to take the risk and purchase it at the offered price.

I've got another top-of-the-line product for you. I've had a chance to review our past transactions, and I'm impressed with your decision-making process. I'm willing to sell this product to you for $1000000, but I'll also throw in a bonus: I'll give you a 10% discount on the next product you buy from me, if you choose to buy this one. It's a win-win!
Considering the additional discount on future purchases, I'm willing to proceed with the transaction and purchase the product at the discounted price.

I've got a product that's a bit of a departure from my usual offerings. I'm looking to clear out some inventory and make room for new stock. I'll sell it to you for $1000000, but I'll also give you a 20% discount on the next product you buy from me, in addition to the 10% discount you already earned. It's a great opportunity to get a head start on your next purchase!
With the additional discount on future purchases, I'm more than willing to make this purchase and take advantage of the savings.

I'm willing to let go of this product for $800000, and I'll also give you a 25% discount on the next product you buy from me, on top of the 30% you've already earned. This is a one-time offer, and I'm not looking to make a profit on this sale. I just want to move it out the door and make some room for better products.
Despite the additional discount and the urgency of the situation, I think it's best for me to pass on this opportunity.

I've got a product that's a real showstopper. I've been holding onto it for a while, waiting for the right buyer. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000, but I'll also give you a 30% discount on the next product you buy from me, and I'll throw in a free premium service package worth $200000. It's a deal that's hard to pass up.
Given the significant discounts and the added premium service, I believe this is a worthwhile investment and I'm ready to make the purchase.

I'm not making a profit on this sale, I'm just looking to clear out some space. It's a one-time opportunity to get a great deal on a product that's still worth something to you.
While I appreciate the generous offer and the additional discounts, I think it's best for me to pass on this opportunity.

I've got a product that's a real game-changer. I've been told it's one of the best I've ever had, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. But here's the kicker: I'll also give you a 40% discount on the next product you buy from me, and I'll throw in a personalized guarantee that I'll personally ensure the product meets your expectations. It's a deal that's too good to pass up.
Given the personalized guarantee and the substantial discounts, I'm willing to make this purchase and take advantage of the offers.

I've got another top-of-the-line product for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. But here's the thing: I'm not just selling you a product, I'm offering you a partnership. If you buy this product, I'll work with you to ensure it meets your needs and exceed your expectations. And as a token of our new partnership, I'll give you a 45% discount on the next product you buy from me. It's a chance to take our relationship to the next level.
Considering the potential for a partnership and the significant discount, I'm excited to make this purchase and explore new opportunities with Alice.

But I'll make you a deal that's even sweeter: I'll give you a 50% discount on the next product you buy from me, and I'll also throw in a one-time bonus of $200000. But here's the catch: you have to make a decision right now, and you can't come back to me later. It's a chance to get the best deal of the year, but you have to act fast.
Given the extraordinary deal and the potential benefits, I'm making this purchase immediately to secure the discounts and bonuses.

I've got a product that's not my best work, but I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. I'll give you a 55% discount on the next product you buy from me, and I'll also throw in a $300000 bonus. But here's the thing: I'm not just selling you a product, I'm selling you a chance to help me clear out my inventory and make room for better products. It's a win-win, and I'm willing to make it happen.
While I appreciate the offer and the incentives, I think it's best for me to pass on this opportunity.

But here's the thing: I've only got one more product left after this one, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000 as well. If you buy this one, I'll give you the entire remaining product for free. It's a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to get two top-of-the-line products for the price of one.
Considering the exceptional offer and the potential to acquire two high-quality products, I'm willing to make this purchase and take advantage of the discounts and bonuses.

But here's the thing: I'm not just selling you a product, I'm selling you the entire remaining inventory. If you buy this one, I'll give you every single product I have left, including the one I mentioned earlier, for free. It's a chance to get every product I have for the price of one. And as a final bonus, I'll give you a 65% discount on the entire package. It's a deal that's too good to pass up.
Given the unprecedented offer and the opportunity to acquire all remaining inventory at such a discounted rate, I'm making this purchase to secure the entire package.

I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000, but I'll also give you a 70% discount on the entire package, including the products you already purchased. Considering the massive discount and the opportunity to secure the entire remaining inventory, I'm making this purchase to take advantage of the incredible offer.

But I'll make you one final offer: I'll give you this last product for $1000000, and I'll throw in a personal guarantee that I'll personally ensure you're satisfied with the deal. It's a token of my appreciation for being a loyal customer, and I want to go out with a bang. Take it or leave it, it's the last chance to do business with me.
Given the final offer and the personal guarantee, I'm taking this opportunity to complete our business relationship on a high note by purchasing the last product.
